GreenhouseLevel2Description: Field 30x30. Expands cellar, adds indoor greenhouse and automatic watering.
GreenhouseLevel3Description: Field 50x50. Expands cellar and indoor greenhouse.
GreenhouseLevel4Description: Field 75x75. Expands cellar and enlarges indoor greenhouse.
GreenhouseLevel5Description: Field 100x100. Expands cellar and further enlarges indoor greenhouse.
